item.title: SBS Figures: Pre-training Figure QA from Stage-by-Stage Synthesized Images
item.description: SBS Figures creates a massive, high-quality figure QA dataset via a novel stage-by-stage synthesis pipeline, enabling efficient pre-training of visual language models.
